turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: Certainly. Could you please provide your full name and date of birth for verification?

turns.utterance: It's David Miller, date of birth is July 12, 1988. I need a general check-up.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Miller. Dr. Sharma has availability on the following dates: October 26th at 10:00 AM, October 27th at 2:30 PM, and November 1st at 9:00 AM. Which of these works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
